Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-58058 affecting package skopeo for versions less than 1.14.4-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-58058 affecting package skopeo for versions less than 1.14.4-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package skopeo is earlier than 1.14.4-6, affected by CVE-2025-58058
